entries.name: Karen Soren, MD
entries.department: Department of Pediatrics Division of Pediatric Child and Adolescent Medicine
entries.title: Resident Physician
entries.title-details: A resident physician is a doctor who is receiving specialized training (also called residency) in general pediatrics. He/she is a doctor but does not yet practice independently.
entries.bio: Clinical interests include adolescent uptake of vaccines and mental health. She enjoys running and has run 3 marathons.
